title: Which is that thing that you would like to collect but actually don't use it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I really like to see this every time and always try to keep it in front of my eyes, so that it encourage s me to be on move. This is shuttle cock. I like to play Bad Binton a lot. I can even manage to play this game in a small room. Upon that I want to have the best shuttlecock with right threading, and because of this I end up collecting many. Even if I don't have a partner to play with, I'm happy with playing myself and so the sight of shuttle cock makes me feel relaxed and motivates me to be always active.

I am fascinated with binoculars! I actually use one maybe six times a year, so I don’t use one much. At last count, I think I have sixteen. Smallest is just bigger than a pack of cigarettes. Largest is suitcase-size and and weighs 28 pounds without the tripod. I would buy more!
